quote: Whatever I fed to his mind, thinking it was nutrition was, in fact, poison. No matter how much a person likes or craves sugar, he should not be raised on the diet of only sugar ~ Rudransh Kashyap
quote_letters: WHATEVER I FED TO HIS MIND THINKING IT WAS NUTRITION WAS IN FACT POISON NO MATTER HOW MUCH A PERSON LIKES OR CRAVES SUGAR HE SHOULD NOT BE RAISED ON THE DIET OF ONLY SUGAR RUDRANSH KASHYAP
